crystalmaiden_cm_battlebegins_01: It's all fun and games until someone's frozen solid.
crystalmaiden_cm_firstblood_01: First Blood, and it's already icing over!
crystalmaiden_cm_move_11: Swift as the wolves of Icewrack...
crystalmaiden_cm_levelup_03: Is it cold in here or is it just me?
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_04: To the Frozen Waste with you!
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_05: You move like a Blueheart Glacier!
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_07: Guess you didn't know a little game of freeze tag could turn lethal.
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_09: You'll make a nice snow angel.
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_10: I can't see your breath anymore.
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_11: Your fate was always crystal clear.
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_13: You're dead and that's a cold hard fact.
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_18: Hm hm hm hm ha ha!
crystalmaiden_cm_kill_20: Heh heh heh heh heh heh heh.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_02: That's enough, Lina, you're melting my stuff.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_03: This time, Lina, it ends in ice.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_05: You'd think all that ice would make him nice.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_06: Sorry, Lich, you're doing it wrong.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_07: You think you can snow me?
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_08: Your wind was messing up my snowflakes.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_09: Too much bluster, not enough snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_10: That storm sort of fizzled out.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_11: That was a test, Tinker. And you failed.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_12: Tinker, your equations aren't half as cold as they could be.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_13: Take your own temperature next time.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_14: No more hoofin' it in my snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_15: Hey, Queenie, you might wanna put a little ice on that.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_16: Queen of Pain? She left me numb.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_17: I almost liked half of you.
crystalmaiden_cm_rival_21: I miss our snowball fights, Ymir.
crystalmaiden_cm_ally_01: See if you can keep up, sis!
crystalmaiden_cm_ally_02: I'll freeze them and you shatter, Phoenix.
crystalmaiden_cm_ally_04: This'll be like old times, Ymir.
crystalmaiden_cm_ally_05: That's a lovely shade of blue, Sven.
crystalmaiden_cm_ally_06: Sven, are you still so blue under that armor?
crystalmaiden_cm_ally_07: Juggernaut, let them feel the cool of your blade!
crystalmaiden_cm_lina_07: My heart will never thaw toward you, sister!
crystalmaiden_cm_lina_08: My heart will never thaw toward you!
crystalmaiden_cm_lina_11: I'm sorry, Sister. I always was the good one.
crystalmaiden_cm_lina_18: I always was the good one.
crystalmaiden_cm_lina_19: I always was the good one.
crystalmaiden_cm_fastres_01: I hope you weren't waiting for a thaw!
crystalmaiden_cm_respawn_07: Nothing like a little cool down...
crystalmaiden_cm_rare_01: When Hell freezes over, I'll start calling it Heaven.
crystalmaiden_cm_rare_02: Can you guess my favorite poet?
crystalmaiden_cm_rare_03: Someday I'll return to the Blueheart Glacier and sleep for a thousand years.
crystalmaiden_cm_rare_04: You can burn my body but you'll never thaw my soul.
crystalmaiden_cm_deny_03: I won't give them the satisfaction...
crystalmaiden_cm_purch_02: Sometimes you just have to splurge...
crystalmaiden_cm_blink_02: Oh the cold, how it cuts.
crystalmaiden_cm_bottle_02: I'll put this aside for later.
crystalmaiden_cm_illus_02: One to many, many to one!
crystalmaiden_cm_drop_medium_01: This'll keep me cool on a hot day.
crystalmaiden_cm_drop_rare_01: A treasure rare as a glacier's heart!
crystalmaiden_cm_win_03: Of course we won! How could it be otherwise?
crystalmaiden_cm_laugh_05: Uh hu ha ha ha ha.
crystalmaiden_cm_laugh_06: Ah ha ha ha ha ha.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_001: Augmentation is a viable pathway. For creatures who lack force of will...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_003: At least your efforts are genuine, Razzil. You rely on nothing but your wits.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_005: Why do you fight here, Kaldr? Patience will deliver your ends in time.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_007: I have nothing to teach you, child. Your mind is too full of lies.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_009: How does one self so easily accept its fate to die in service of the other?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_011: There are no lessons for you, Axe. Only prerequisites.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_013: You are a creature of indulgence, Bane. You would not survive on the ice.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_015: The fleeting nature of your existence doesn't seem to trouble you at all.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_017: Do not mistake me, human. I am not one for your menagerie.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_019: Speed betrays weakness, blood hunter. What need have I to run?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_021: You do realize the enemy can still see your footprints in the snow...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_023: How pure are your spirits, Brewmaster? That will determine when they freeze.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_025: Take care your mucus doesn't freeze before you sneeze it out.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_027: Your kind must have a secret weapon against the cold...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_029: Tell me. Is it not degrading to pull the cart?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_031: All fundamentals are welcome to fight by my side.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_033: You cannot compell me, Chen. You may attempt to query.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_035: The others may have need of your fire.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_037: I would warn against licking the inside of your helm.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_041: Always am I curious. What shape is your brain?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_043: You will not get a rise from me, child. No matter how outlandish your attempts.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_045: Even I must recognize the beauty of a star-filled sky.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_047: If your powers are reversed...it suggests you intend to harm me.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_051: Our storms will shatter their courage and still their souls.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_053: Can we work in harmony, Doom? You strike me as the rebellious type.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_055: Piteous dragon. Shackled to such a feeble form.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_057: I may be frigid, but not so glum as you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_059: What do you make of these presumptous mortals?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_061: The earth always endures. Even when cleared by blight.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_063: Do not regret your creations, Titan. Revel in the mad wilderness you've wrought.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_065: You should stand clear of me for your own safety, Xin. Not mine.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_067: Do not herd me, Enchantress. I'm not one of your flock.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_071: I count myself as affirmation that if one could choose to have a face, they surely would do so.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_073: I come here with purpose. I'm indifferent to your crimes.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_075: We must hope your machinery overcomes such unenviable imperfections.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_077: All this one requires is a few stern reprimands...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_081: At last a worthy ally appears.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_083: Even your long life is a minor flash in the grand design.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_085: With some effort, I can appreciate the balance you proclaim.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_089: If we account for your addled mind, we may win this fight yet...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_097: I should leave you powerless... But we need your efforts in this fight.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_101: Your sister would not have endured without the likes of you to test her during her youth.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_107: Your friend has a marvelous build.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_109: In essence, I am a shapeshifter as well.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_120: As you can see, I have a fascination with the creatures of your plane.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_133: I suppose we must be allies for this fight.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_137: Who could doubt the power of good fortune...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_141: Your visions do not show the future, Oracle. Only the echoes of a forgotten past.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_143: For whom do you watch, Harbinger? And what do they spell for our fate?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_151: Did you know of the Dawnbreaker's fate when you re-lit the forge?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_167: I wonder, Rubick. Does Aghanim have plans for you yet?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_179: A guide for your studies, sad one. The answers you seek lie beyond the terrene plane.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_193: Calm yourself, Raijin. Apply your power with focus and restraint.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_205: You do realize, Rizzrack... There are places to live above the tree line.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_215: You're still too green, even if you do survive.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_221: Devotion is sentiment, Ursa. I've watched many a student die.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_223: Scree'auk is not so clever, child. There are surely avenues to break her curse.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_231: Your presence is welcome here, Inai. I had feared they'd all be children.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_233: Nothing you have written could be of interest to me.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_237: Together we can blind them with winds and snows.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_239: I do not understand your artistic endeavors, Auroth. But I am sure they will catch on in time...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_240: Unexpectedly, you feel almost like an adopted child.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_243: Those like you are why I choose my students carefully.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_ally_300: Poor soul. The sins you died for were not even your own.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_arcane_03: Now the only question is where to strike.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_01: The wisdom of Blueheart benefits all.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_04: Even the avalanche begins with a single flake.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_05: Small minds sneer at such gifts.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_06: The true power from which all else flows...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_09: I empower my allies to strike.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_10: Mana flows freely in the cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_aura_increase_11: Mana shares origins with the ice.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_battlebegins_01: Finish this quickly. Let us not glorify this fight.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_battlebegins_02: Both sides are called to battle. Our side will prevail.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_battlebegins_03: I do not seek bloodshed. But shed blood I will.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_battlebegins_04: Their hopes will fade when they feel the bite of cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_battlebegins_05: Let the snows blind them and icefalls block their trails.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_blink_02: Is this teleportation or mere speed?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_bottle_03: I admit it's a neat trick.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_bottle_05: Might we use it in time.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_bounty_02: I need not beg for scraps.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_cast_04: I offer an avalanche of ice.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_death_05: In the next life...I will remember this.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_death_07: I merely return...to my true form...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_death_15: I part with this life...and await the next...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_death_rival_02: At least I fall...to a worthy foe...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_deny_11: The odds are technically in your favor...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_deny_15: Did you think this would be easy?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_doubledam_02: And I even like the color.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_drop_rare_02: I did not think to find this here...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_fastres_02: Like stepping through a freshly-fallen snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_firstblood_02: First blood! Too frozen to flow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_firstblood_03: First blood. These children play at war.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_firstblood_04: You fall first. I stain your blood with snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_firstblood_05: First blood. Of an avalanche to come.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_freezing_field_05: The winds rage and the ice blows.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_freezing_field_06: Ice as far as I can see.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_freezing_field_kil: None survive in Blueheart against my will.
How can you fight the rage of a storm?
They won't even need to pack you in ice.
As the snows fall, so do you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_frostbite_kill_02: Let the chill numb your pain.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_frostbite_kill_03: It's far too cold for tears.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_frostbite_kill_06: This was mercy, child. I could have shown you true cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_frostbite_kill_07: How does it feel to watch yourself die?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_frostbite_kill_09: Tell me... How do you feel?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_frostbite_kill_10: For all your power, you were cut down by a gust of crisp air...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_illus_03: What shall I make of this?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_inthebag_01: The outcome of this conflict is certain to me.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_inthebag_02: They have no hope of unfreezing this bag.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_intro_01: Ignorance blinds you, child. Let Blueheart's wisdom show you the way.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_intro_01_b_let_blu: Let Blueheart's wisdom show you the way.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_intro_02: Foolish child. Let Blueheart's wisdom show you the way.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_intro_03: The Blueheart offers power to those who find the way.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_001: I could sense that this foul magic was near...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_003: The Blueheart will envelop them all.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_004: Boots blessed by my own breath.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_005: Why must I make this wicked trade?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_006: What finds this so far from hell?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_009: The echoes of the black king's reign will ring until the end of time.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_012: In the cold they will find silence.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_013: To overcome the constraints of this form.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_018: I suppose they have earned it.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_026: The drums of war will sound across the ice plains.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_029: A wonder that it does not freeze.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_033: A natural augmentation of my powers.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_044: Into the eye of an ice storm...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_046: I've seen this staff in a student's hand...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_047: Natural or no, a strange pairing.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_048: I must grant, it is a useful trick.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_050: A value far beyond its price.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_054: All can share in this bounty.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_064: It will be the edge we need.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_071: None would expect this... Not even me.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_072: These will show the path to victory.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_073: We must never reveal our plans.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_077: I claim the Eye of Skadi.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_081: A fine sphere. Wasted on its creator.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_084: Even I have ever more to learn.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_085: Perhaps I should pen a tome.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_086: We thank those who share their knowledge.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_106: Boots of Bearing. Yet I bear them...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_item_108: A sad tale. But not mine to tell.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_02: The Blueheart will grow to cover your bones.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_03: You've won nothing by coming here.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_06: You cannot begin to test me.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_08: Close your eyes and surrender to the cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_09: Fear not, child. Your shame will soon be forgotten.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_10: I do not take pleasure in your death. But it does not bring me sorrow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_11: Your last words also died quickly, against the howling wind.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_14: I will not insult you by pretending to care.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_kill_15: This would have been even worse for you on the elemental plane.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_lasthit_01: I strike with purpose. Not for gold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_lasthit_02: I've not had need of treasure before...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_lasthit_04: Like a babe lost in the snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_laugh_04: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_laugh_05: Ah ha ha ha ha ha haa ha
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_laugh_06: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_01: I seek not this power. Only the knowledge whence it flows...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_02: I unlock memories of a former age...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_05: I prepare myself to smother this land.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_08: And still we push for more.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_10: Each day I walk this land, I recollect more and more.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_12: The frost will rime their souls.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_13: We seek power not for glory, only for need.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_14: We must choose our focus wisely...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_levelup_15: Where does the icewind blow us?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_lose_03: Until the next break of winter...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_lose_04: The heart of the glacier crumbles...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_lose_06: This loss threatens even the elemental plane...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_a_02: Through which all frost magics of the world flow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_a_03: Only when a worthy student rises...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_a_04: Might I materialize to step from Blueheart's core.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_a_05: To choose one who must carry the secret burden of the living.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_a_06: And keep a world of chaos clinging to a semblance of balance.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_a_07: Or, failing that, decide when the next age of ice begins.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_b_01: To those who think my tutelage a prize, cold realization awaits.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_b_02: You win nothing by coming here.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_b_03: A lonely glacier for your home.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_b_04: A mountain of books your only friend.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_b_05: And when you have endured all I have to teach you...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_b_06: The fate of an entire world of warmblood kin will rest in your weary hands.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_c_01: To master my lessons requires ages.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_c_02: Years longer than most mortals live.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_c_04: And those who touch the power of the Blueheart will endure.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_c_05: Strong enough to suffer long, lonely lives -- a step out of time.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_c_06: And when their frost watch has ended...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_c_07: They will join with me for a well-earned, eternal sleep.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_01: If they so choose, my students may find their own pupils.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_02: Those they believe I might accept for further training.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_03: But even amongst the adepts, true candidates are few.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_04: Most wither under my gaze immediately.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_05: Or, at best, survive a number of days before rasping a final breath.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_06: I do not relish their passing. Nor do I feel sorrow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_monologue_d_07: In the darkness and the cold, one finds only...indifference to organic life.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_move_04: I touch the earth through will alone.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_nova_kill_03: I did not give you permission to leave.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_nova_kill_04: The unprepared often perish in the snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_nova_kill_06: A wounded animal staggered by the snow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_nova_kill_07: We found the weakness inside you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_nova_kill_08: Let the scavengers pick at your bits.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_outpost_capture_02: Our enemies will find no refuge here.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_purch_01: It seems I accept your terms.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_purch_03: I care not to bargain. Tell me your price.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_purch_04: But why do you covet this gold?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_respawn_01: I have never failed to reappear.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_respawn_04: This will only make me stronger.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_respawn_07: Perhaps a misstep. Or cunning calculation.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_001: You believed the mist brought you power. Now you learn. Your misery only begins.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_003: You try tricks in the face of my power?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_005: Your paradise might come. But not by your hand.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_007: Your mind was broken early. I send your body to follow.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_008: Hatred doesn't burn hot enough to save you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_009: This is necessary, ancient one. To meet your own ends.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_011: Your brain wasn't empty. Merely small and full.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_013: Your delights delude you, Bane. Now cold reality sets in.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_015: Wings only ice over in my realm.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_017: Your beasts were noble. But not nearly stout enough.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_019: You find nothing here but frost and fury.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_021: None who know of me would bother with such a petty means as you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_023: Those like you are blind to the value of austerity.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_029: The ice takes your body, your days of glory forgotten.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_031: We will not blame you for what you are. But mercy will not stand.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_032: Even chaos must diminish in the cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_033: Fool. Do you confuse me for a thrall?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_037: Brittle metal to match your bones.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_045: The stars are much too far away to warm you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_047: Even in Nothl, cold blows cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_049: The cold hand of death was warm all along.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_051: The echoes of thunder fade in drifting snows...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_053: Bear this chill to the depths of every hell.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_055: The glow of your fire fades...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_057: Your gifts could hardly be called magic.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_059: Earth splits easily when left to freeze.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_065: You were a tiny candle, raging against an impossible storm.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_067: Not even the fires of the fae could save you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_069: You who understood true cold...should never have tested my mettle.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_071: The first snows fall on the expanse of Clasz.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_073: What can you paint with solid ink?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_075: The skies are much too cold for soaring.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_077: If only you had friends to gather for warmth...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_081: You may be unkillable in essence, but your manifestations can surely die.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_083: You abuse my gifts, Invoker. No more.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_085: Yours was a dangerous balance. Destined to die.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_089: The world wanted warmth from you. You barely provided light.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_090: An ancient light... Bereft of wisdom.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_091: You should have started with an icebreaker...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_093: Discipline hid your shivers, but the cold still stole your breath.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_095: The world tires of your spite.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_097: They ask why I did not kill you sooner. All comes due in time.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_101: Your sister towers above you, child.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_103: Your sickness of mind has twisted your form.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_105: Spirit bears have no flesh to warm you...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_107: The ice in your heart finds a fitting home.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_109: A beautiful form. Wasted on you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_113: I had no wish to see you suffer. But your choice was made.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_115: The fires of war have burned too brightly. May your death bring peace.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_123: I'm no god, Wu Kong. Your mischief means nothing here.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_133: For endless ages, I've quietly hoped for your death.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_134: Cold and darkness are friends to me, too.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_139: There are limits for even the most powerful beings, Omniknight. Those who claim omniscience are peddling lies.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_151: Even the fires of heaven die amidst this storm.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_179: Nothing but a waste of potential...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_193: I must confess, Raijin. You have never impressed me.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_215: I expected your folly to kill you. What I did not expect was that I might take part.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_231: Renowned for your wisdom... Who could have foreseen such a clueless end?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_233: Nothing more tiresome than the hubris of the human mind.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_237: Child of the wind no more.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_239: I allowed your residence in Icewrack. It seems I made a mistake...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_243: The souls you've stolen do not concern me. I merely don't like the look of your face.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_245: Such hubris, Zeus. Lightning was never the most dangerous element of a storm.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_rival_300: The world is awash in suffering. What sets yours apart?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_scepter_02: Unexpected innovation from one so young...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_01: Bow before the wisdom of Blueheart.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_03: Amidst my winter, they dare not dream of spring.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_04: There is much I can teach you, should you survive...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_05: What would you ask of the Blueheart?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_06: Should I choose it, ice will cover the world.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_07: I bring hard lessons none of you wish to learn.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_08: Only from your limited perspective is the glacier slow...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_10: All they can do is huddle for warmth.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_11: I command the frozen storm. Seek no comfort here.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_12: Are you worthy of my teachings?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_13: Those who seek my powers are wise enough to know they choose a life of burden.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_14: Mine is a song of ice and ire.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_spawn_15: Their howls of agony will soon fill the air.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_taunt_01: I sense this fight will break you.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_taunt_02: Your fears are well founded. Surrender to the cold.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_whawiz_01: I have higher standards for a wizard...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_all_01: What foolish thought gave rise to this?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_all_02: I knew you were not worthy...
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_all_03: What are we to do with this?
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_all_05: I offer wisdom. You're in need of much much more.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_all_07: I am not angry. I'm disappointed and angry.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_thanks_01: I owe you gratitude, not tribute.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_wheel_thanks_02: I will say thank you. But I recognize no debt.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_win_04: The glacier will grow to cover this world.
crystalmaiden_cm_wolf_win_05: So begins an age of ice.
